entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
